Package client

Class ChatClient

java.lang.Object
ocsf.client.AbstractClient
client.ChatClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ChatClient extends ocsf.client.AbstractClient
This class overrides some of the methods defined in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the client.
Version:
July 2000
Author:
Dr Timothy C. Lethbridge, Dr Robert Laganiè, François Bélanger

    • awaitResponse

      Indicates whether the client is awaiting a response from the server.

    • currBranchReports

      public static BranchReports currBranchReports
      The current BranchReports object being used by the application. This object holds the branch reports data for the selected branch.

    • lastDataFetchMonth

      public static int lastDataFetchMonth
      The last month (as an integer) when the branch reports data was fetched. This is used to determine if the data needs to be refreshed based on the current month.

    • lastDataFetchMonthQuarter

      public static int lastDataFetchMonthQuarter
      The last month (as an integer) when the quarter reports data was fetched. This is used to determine if the quarter reports data needs to be refreshed based on the current month.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatClient

      public ChatClient(String host, int port, ChatIF clientUI) throws IOException
      Constructs an instance of the chat client.
      Parameters:
      host - The server to connect to.
      port - The port number to connect on.
      clientUI - The interface type variable.
      Throws:
      IOException
